data.name: The Contractor
data.detailed_description:
Pateron bonus !

For any of those that support the development of my game, get exclusive access to beta test new things for the game ! + in-game codes and more are coming !


About the Game

The world is in danger but who cares really? You’re just here to fulfill some contracts and hopefully get paid along the way! But who knows you might just care along the way and take down some targets that are causing some trouble… Featuring Ambient lighting Duel wielding! Dynamic leveling of enemies Dynamic lighting FPS Monitor Sync 8 Classes to pick from with 8 subclasses Multi-classing Multiple classes with different skills/magic talents to unlock Water reflection Controls Up/Down/Left/Right to move around Escape key to bring up menu and cancel Enter Key to accept/interact Xbox controller (if using PlayStation or other controllers go-to gamepad configuration) Up/Down/Left right to move around A to accept/interact B to escape/cancel Start to bring up menu
data.about_the_game:
The world is in danger but who cares really? You’re just here to fulfill some contracts and hopefully get paid along the way! But who knows you might just care along the way and take down some targets that are causing some trouble…


Featuring
Ambient lighting
Duel wielding!
Dynamic leveling of enemies
Dynamic lighting
FPS Monitor Sync
8 Classes to pick from with 8 subclasses
Multi-classing
Multiple classes with different skills/magic talents to unlock
Water reflection

Controls
Up/Down/Left/Right to move around
Escape key to bring up menu and cancel
Enter Key to accept/interact

Xbox controller (if using PlayStation or other controllers go-to gamepad configuration)
Up/Down/Left right to move around
A to accept/interact
B to escape/cancel
Start to bring up menu
data.short_description: The world is in danger but who cares really? You’re just here to fulfill some contracts and hopefully get paid along the way! But who knows you might just care along the way and take down some targets that are causing some trouble…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

data.legal_notice:
The Contractor is property of dragon1up studios
